title: Hybrid Microlearning Program for Strengthening Climate Change Leadership Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic science knowledge and experience in education/administration
context.additional_context: A climate change education program for corporate managers/leaders, combining mobile learning via digital devices with monthly offline workshops and providing continuous feedback through formative assessments.

learning_goals: They can explain at least three scientific mechanisms and economic impacts of climate change
They can design team-based carbon reduction strategies and develop actionable implementation plans
They can propose organization-specific responses by applying a climate risk management framework
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
